title: Heavy Heart Exclamation Mark Ornament
description: A decorative exclamation mark, where a heart forms the top part of the symbol, and a circle the lower part. Similar to the way to the man in business suit levitating also creates a similar shape.
apple_vendor_description: A vibrant red heart, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading, sits atop a bright white exclamation mark on Apple devices. The heart possesses a soft, rounded edge and is illuminated by realistic lighting, giving it a warm, inviting glow. This emoji powerfully signifies urgent love, passionate excitement, or a strong, emphatic declaration of affection or importance.
